rule-5-2-a.test_description: U-RMR includes two surfaces. Azimuth of each surface in P-RMR is the same as in U-RMR.

standard.ruleset_reference:
G3.1 #1 (a) The simulation model of the proposed design shall be consistent
with the design documents…
standard.rule_description: Orientation is the same in user model and proposed model

rule-5-3-a.test_description: Building has interior and exterior surfaces. All exterior surfaces are correctly modeled as not casting shade in the baseline

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5(a), baseline column: The building shall be modeled so that it does not shade itself.
standard.rule_description: Baseline building must be modeled so that it doesn't shade itself

rule-5-3-b.test_description: Building has interior and exterior surfaces. One exterior surface is incorrectly modeled as casting shade in the baseline

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5(a), baseline column: The building shall be modeled so that it does not shade itself.
standard.rule_description: Baseline building must be modeled so that it doesn't shade itself

rule-5-5-a.test_description: Building is located in climate zone 4A and includes a space that has residential occupancy type and is  coditioned based on heating capacity of the HVAC system that servies the parent zone. The baseline roof U-factor for the space is established correctly.

standard.ruleset_reference: G3.1 #5 (b) Opaque assemblies used for new buildings, existing buildings, or additions ... shall match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8:
standard.rule_description: Baseline roof assemblies must match the appropriate assembly maximum U-factors in Tables G3.4-1 through G3.4-8

rule-5-44-a.test_description: weather_driven infiltration modeling method is used

standard.ruleset_reference:
Table G3.1 #5 (b) proposed column: Infiltration shall be modeled using... adjustments for weather and building operation. These adjustments shall be made for each simulation time step and must account for but not be limited to weather conditions and HVAC system operation, including strategies that are
intended to positively pressurize the building.
standard.rule_description: The  infiltration modeling method in the baseline includes adjustment for weather and building operation.
standard.rule_dependency: 1. Baseline heating and cooling capacities are established correctly (air-side HVAC rule TBD). This affects baseline space conditioning categories

rule-5-44-b.test_description: pressure_based infiltration modeling method is used

standard.ruleset_reference:
Table G3.1 #5 (b) proposed column: Infiltration shall be modeled using... adjustments for weather and building operation. These adjustments shall be made for each simulation time step and must account for but not be limited to weather conditions and HVAC system operation, including strategies that are
intended to positively pressurize the building.
standard.rule_description: The  infiltration modeling method in the baseline includes adjustment for weather and building operation.
standard.rule_dependency: 1. Baseline heating and cooling capacities are established correctly (air-side HVAC rule TBD). This affects baseline space conditioning categories

rule-5-46-a.test_description: The proposed infiltration modeling method is the same as the baseline infiltration modeling method

standard.ruleset_reference:
Table G3.1 #5 (b) proposed column: Infiltration shall be modeled using the same methodology
and adjustments for weather and building operation in both the proposed design and the baseline building design.
standard.rule_description: The Infiltration shall be modeled using the same methodology and adjustments for weather and building operation in both the proposed design and the baseline building design.

rule-5-46-b.test_description: The proposed infiltration modeling method is the same as the baseline infiltration modeling method

standard.ruleset_reference:
Table G3.1 #5 (b) proposed column: Infiltration shall be modeled using the same methodology
and adjustments for weather and building operation in both the proposed design and the baseline building design.
standard.rule_description: The Infiltration shall be modeled using the same methodology and adjustments for weather and building operation in both the proposed design and the baseline building design.
